content: the breton stripe sweater combines a simple round loose balloon sleeves oversized fit and stripe details to create an effortlessly chic and comfy sweater the length of the sweater and stripes can all be altered to fit any style or colour palette for a more minimalist look you can crochet solid coloured sweater or colour block for a statement look this pattern is accompanied by a video tutorial slightly_smiling_face sizes xs s m l xl 2xl 3xl 4xl 5xl skill level easy+ check out more free crochet patterns ** here 1 ** sign up to my ** newsletter 2 ** and never miss a new crochet pattern release 1 https //forthefrills com 2 https //view flodesk com/pages/5ebf67c2ab499000265d1ad4
